duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement best practices for billing management functions.
Lead a team of billing specialists, ensuring overall alignment with the firm’s billing practices, policies, and procedures.
Provide daily supervision, support, and guidance to direct reports, ensure work assignments are completed in a timely manner, and meet the expectations of internal and external clients.

Interact with clients, attorneys, and business professionals, act as a point of escalation, research and resolve billing issues, including account analysis, and assist attorneys and the billing team with processing and collecting invoices in a timely manner.
Track team metrics to ensure the team is meeting service level requirements, analyze service level issues, and implement solutions expeditiously.
Participate and support project management initiatives, as well as lead and manage projects to include project planning, development, and execution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting or similar field (Master's preferred)
